name: Student
text: Summer at Purdue is quiet but nice. Have you visited any local summer events?

name: You
text: Not yet, I’m still figuring out what’s around. What’s good?

name: Student
text: You should try the Taste of Tippecanoe; it’s a great way to try local foods and enjoy live music.

name: You
text: Sounds like a blast! I'll definitely check it out. Thanks!
